metadata.description: Personal curated collection: SuperClaude framework + Chrome DevTools + NetSuite workflows + best community plugins

plugins.name: superclaude-framework
plugins.description: Complete SuperClaude framework with FLAGS, PRINCIPLES, RULES, 5 behavioral modes, and 6 bundled MCPs (Context7, Sequential, Magic, Playwright, Serena, Morphllm)

plugins.name: chrome-devtools
plugins.description: Chrome DevTools MCP for browser automation, E2E testing, and visual validation (separate from Playwright)

plugins.name: netsuite-workflows
plugins.description: NetSuite SDF deployment automation with twx-sdf-deploy.sh integration for Record Display app

plugins.name: personal-automation
plugins.description: Custom infrastructure workflows, agents, and automation patterns (template for future additions)

plugins.name: anthropic-document-skills
plugins.description: ⭐ Curated: Anthropic's official document processing (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, PDF)

plugins.name: anthropic-example-skills
plugins.description: ⭐ Curated: Anthropic's example skills (MCP builder, canvas design, algorithmic art, etc.)

plugins.name: backend-development
plugins.description: ⭐ Curated: Seth Hobson's backend API design, architecture patterns, and microservices

plugins.name: frontend-mobile-development
plugins.description: ⭐ Curated: Seth Hobson's React, Flutter, and mobile development workflows

plugins.name: security-scanning
plugins.description: ⭐ Curated: Seth Hobson's security auditing and SAST configuration

plugins.name: kubernetes-operations
plugins.description: ⭐ Curated: Seth Hobson's K8s workflows with GitOps, Helm, and manifest generation
